technical_skills_courses.title: Web Development Fundamentals
technical_skills_courses.description: Get started with the basics of web development including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
technical_skills_courses.other_info: This course covers front-end and back-end web development, responsive design principles, and version control systems. Duration: 12 weeks. Hands-on coding projects and portfolio building. Instructor-led sessions.

technical_skills_courses.title: Python Programming
technical_skills_courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming language for various applications.
technical_skills_courses.other_info: Master Python syntax, data structures, and object-oriented programming concepts. Duration: 10 weeks. Coding exercises and mini-projects. Self-paced learning with personalized feedback.

technical_skills_courses.title: Data Science Essentials
technical_skills_courses.description: Introduction to data science concepts including data analysis, visualization, and machine learning.
technical_skills_courses.other_info: Explore data manipulation, statistical analysis, and predictive modeling techniques using Python and R. Duration: 14 weeks. Data science projects and Kaggle competitions. Instructor-led sessions.

technical_skills_courses.title: JavaScript Frameworks
technical_skills_courses.description: Explore popular JavaScript frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue.js for building modern web applications.
technical_skills_courses.other_info: Learn to build single-page applications, user interfaces, and interactive web components using React, Angular, and Vue.js. Duration: 10 weeks. Hands-on coding labs and real-world projects. Self-paced learning.

technical_skills_courses.title: Database Management
technical_skills_courses.description: Learn SQL and database management principles for efficient data storage and retrieval.
technical_skills_courses.other_info: Master SQL syntax, database design, and query optimization techniques. Duration: 12 weeks. Database projects and case studies. Instructor-led sessions with SQL practice exercises.

technical_skills_courses.title: Mobile App Development
technical_skills_courses.description: Get started with mobile app development using platforms like iOS and Android.
technical_skills_courses.other_info: Explore iOS and Android app development, UI/UX design principles, and mobile app testing. Duration: 10 weeks. App development projects and app store deployment. Self-paced learning with mentor support.

technical_skills_courses.title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
technical_skills_courses.description: Introduction to cybersecurity principles and best practices for protecting digital assets.
technical_skills_courses.other_info: Understand cybersecurity threats, risk assessment, and defense strategies. Duration: 14 weeks. Hands-on labs and cybersecurity simulations. Instructor-led sessions with cybersecurity case studies.

technical_skills_courses.title: Cloud Computing Basics
technical_skills_courses.description: Learn cloud computing concepts and services provided by major cloud providers.
technical_skills_courses.other_info: Explore cloud infrastructure, virtualization, and cloud service models (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS). Duration: 10 weeks. Cloud projects and AWS/Azure/GCP certifications prep. Self-paced learning with cloud labs.

technical_skills_courses.title: DevOps Essentials
technical_skills_courses.description: Explore DevOps practices for automating software development, testing, and deployment.
technical_skills_courses.other_info: Learn continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD), containerization, and infrastructure as code (IaC). Duration: 12 weeks. DevOps projects and automation scripts. Instructor-led sessions with real-world DevOps use cases.

technical_skills_courses.title: Machine Learning Foundations
technical_skills_courses.description: Introduction to machine learning algorithms and techniques for predictive analysis.
technical_skills_courses.other_info: Understand supervised and unsupervised learning, feature engineering, and model evaluation. Duration: 10 weeks. Machine learning projects and Kaggle competitions. Self-paced learning with machine learning libraries.
